name: Women's 'Luxury' T-shirt
description: This item indicates that as part of society's very elite - the ones who wear whatever they want, fly wherever they like, and reign over the lives of others like mercurial gods - you are invited to the most exclusive of events in every part of the cluster. Live a life of boundless, reckless, hedonistic luxury, where nothing, not even death itself, stands in the way of your desires.
